author: Melanie Zelm
comment: I can say it's not off to an impressive start. Getting the nursery ready and hooked up the monitoring system. Easy install but the video takes forever to load as other reviewers state. I'm not getting notifications of motion or sound - kind of the whole point of a baby monitor. The product does not make me free safe and comfortable while baby sleeps and I'm downstairs. Will be returning product immediately.

author: Crystal Berger
comment: The app crashed constantly without notification so I thought everything was fine and then I hear my twins wailing from the other room. The app makes the camera useless and waste of $200 dollars. I wish we had checked the app ratings before we bought because the camera ratings are great and none of the comparison reviews we checked mentioned this.

author: Franz Remigius Nescher
comment: The app is very unstable and unreliable. For a 200$ camera the app makes the camera useless. The reliability is so low it doesn't work as a baby monitor.   Edit: camera doesn't connect at all. Need to restart camera at least once a day.   Edit: once the app manages to get an image, it goes black and takes several minutes to load the live stream again.  Edit: app doesn't save settings, it always rests to default. Edit: very unreliable

author: Michael Collinson
comment: Totally baffling overly clever app UI/UX. For Pete's sake use menus. Hardware would be wonderful but need to return home to unplug / replug when it loses connection - completely undermines use as a remote monitoring tool when I am away. Please keep trying, could be great.

author: Don Bennum
comment: A week and half exchanging emails with customer support (very nice folks). To only be escalated and told they have a know issue with T-Mobile network for remote live view. Doubt it, but if true, shouldn't that have been figured out prior to launch.

reply.author: Nokia Apps Distribution LLC
reply.content: Thanks for sharing your review of the Home Cam app. We are sorry to hear that you are unable to view your feed remotely. We will share your feedback with our app team to help make improvements to the app. Don’t hesitate to reach out to us at https://nokia.health/t/16a988a7 if you have any additional feedback. — Jesse, Nokia Customer Support

author: Iulian Cordobin
comment: The android version app for this product gets stuck as Loading on the live feed, and misses a lot of the options the ios has. Too bad ...

author: Ahdi Alhunaif
comment: Spoke to supports months ago about the Android app freezing constantly, and no solution. I'm unplugging the cam and ordered other brand cam to install. 3-4 months of wait is way too long.  I'm done with this.

The app is constantly shutting down unexpectedly. The live video doesn't load. During the middle of the night, the sound will stop working and we will hear our baby through the walls rather than through the baby monitor we planned to depend on. Extremely disappointed.
Not working on Samsung Note 8. Image froze. App crashes all the times. Please fix this issue.

author: Olivier Lambert
comment: Well done Nokia on buying a great product and turning it into a brick in such a quick time!!!

author: Amber Menzie
comment: Can't get the camera to connect. Will only work if your on wifi.

author: April Ladd
comment: Doesn't load the video!!!

author: Niels van Brecht
comment: Screen quality on Android version is quite poor. Screen is not viewable a lot of the times. Also the iOS app has more and better options, including Ethernet installation.   Please fix this Nokia, would be a shame if this product would fail due to app development lacking!!

author: Jameson Conde
comment: This app is terrible. The camera works great but the app crashes and freezes frequently. I have difficulty connecting to the camera with the Android version. My fiancee iOS app works great on her phone and iPad. I would like to see some algorithm changes for Android to keep using it. Also I would like the camera to not be dependant on the remote cloud server in order to work.

Unstable. Such a shame that this App is unstable on Android. The video suffers graphical corruption and the notifications sometimes crash the app. It works well on iOS such a shame the developers have not fixed issues on Android yet. Even after Nokia bought the app it is still very buggy and unstable.

reply.author: Nokia Apps Distribution LLC
reply.content:
Bonjour John, 

Veuillez nous excuser des problèmes graphiques que vous rencontrez sur votre application. Ce n'est pas un fonctionnement normal, pourriez-vous nous contacter à l'adresse mail contact-sup@withings.com avec plus de précisions ? Nous essaierons de résoudre le problème.
Merci !

L'équipe Support Client Withings

author: Malik Binbek
comment: The Nokia Camera App for Android is terrible! I know this sounds hyperbolic but I also own an iPhone and the iPhone App is light years ahead of this one. I would even suggest that you don't buy this camera of you own an Android device. This is literally an exercise in frustration.

author: Hector Hurtado
comment: Needs improvement. I had some trouble getting it to connect on two devices. Now, I see that sharing any video triggers an error on export. Not fixing this makes the product useless, don't force me to return it.

author: Mudit Garg
comment: This is one of the poorest quality apps I have seen from a company of this size. For the last two years the app has had terrible stability issues. It either crashes or struggles to retrieve videos or the live stream for minutes at a time.   Very poorly built app. Return the camera right away if you are still within the return period. I kept hoping they will improve the app at some point.

author: Danielle Medhurst
comment: Nokia support was useless and told me they had never heard of problems with the Android app. I have directed them here as they didn't seem to believe there was a problem! They were unable to provide a due date for the app to be updated so it's being returned. Unfortunately most people will buy this without seeing the app reviews which is a shame. Pretty sure the one guy saying the app is great works for the programmers. Stealthy!

author: Courtney Seitz
comment: This app and camera are one if the worse purchases I have ever made. We tried it for a baby monitor, but the screen turns completely bright green so we can't see anything. It also fails to connect 70% of the time. We sent it back to the company because they said it was just a faulty camera and the new one does the same thing. Do not buy this!!!

author: Gareth Harris
comment: I have this set up on my work phone, an apple, and it works great. On my Samsung S8 the app is near unusable. Video won't load. Updates come but problem remains. Will make it 5stars as soon as it's as good here as ios

author: Karen Martens
comment: Please come up with update to fix issues with Samsung phones. As you can see many users are complaining. Love the product but it stopped working on my phone!

author: Chris Cardé
comment: It's incredible that Nokia claims that Android is "supported." Sure, there's an Android app -- but it simply doesn't work. The video stream either (a) shows a "ghost" of an old image, (b) distorts to where the image is unrecognizable, or (c) shows a mostly-black image. I can typically stream video for about 5-10 seconds before one of the above occurs. I understand that bugs can crop up in the rush to get a product to market, but I have had this camera for TWO YEARS and it's only become worse instead of better. What a waste of money.

author: Vladislav Urda
comment: Moved from iOS to Samsung S8 and really disappointed! Camera is nice piece of hardware, but Android app sucks! This shouldn't happened to the serious company... NOKIA wake-up call!!!

author: John Iver Berg
comment: Constantly dissconects, and have to physically power off the camera for it to work again. Unusable.

author: Mark Worthington
comment: Live video will not load, playback of recorded video is hit and miss. Rubbish!

author: Marcel Frey
comment: Not stable at all. Live video feed stuck on "loading", tried on 3 different android devices. Please Nokia, test your apps before releasing them...

author: Greg Shuler
comment: Used to work great. App freezes all the time. What happened?! Fix the bugs!! I'm on Samsung S8

author: Joao Branco
comment: I must say i like this cam very much! Honestly, after reading the reviews here, which were all mostly negative, i was a little affraid, but now after i got it really don't understand such complains... sure its not a perfect cam, but image quality i great, zoom capability is awasome, noise alerts work, air quality feature is super! i can only conclude that the people who complain probably have weak devices, i mean when you have streaming apps on your phone you have to expect to have a device that has a high standard on hardware, this is normal you can`t expect to have the same performance in a low spec phone as in a samsung s8... this is probably why people that have an iphone don't complain, its a high spec.phone. I personally own a xiaomi mi5, its a high spec phone with very fast processor and integrated powerfull graphics processor. Dev team, my congratulations to you for a great job, good reviews are also a goos incentive to keep up the good work i guess ;) There are for sure some bugs, sometimes the image turns black, not often but happens, if i go to settings and come back to live it seems it reload so my suggestion would be for you include a refresh option while on image mode, this would help a lot. The design is beautiful, i would enjoy personally to have it with battery, maybe in the next model!  Thanks again!

author: Ben Morris
comment: Works fine on my iPhone but it's next to useless on my Samsung. Fix it Nokia or you will lose me as a customer.

author: Andrzej Figuła
comment: SGS7 Edge.   - Black screen after 5 seconds of live stream. - Unable to connect after restoring from background (after reset it connects). - Live stream freezes and never restores - Air quality not always work - showing just a leaf icon that do nothing (after reset it works).  Camera hardware is ok, quality and idea behind it is great, iOS app is much better (basically it works).  For now this application is really a deal breaker for Android users, it makes huge damage to the great product and Nokia brand. I have few Withings (Nokia) devices, all are perfect apart from this application. If you guys are struggling with resources, time or whatever, give your customers information - should they wait, return product or switch to iOS for now, as this app is not working, was obviously never tested, and should never been published.  Dear Nokia, this app is not a rocket science, if you need any help fixing this, please let me know.

author: John Williamson
comment: Won't work for Android. Video just keeps loading and won't ever stream, regardless if on WiFi or on 3G/4G/LTE.   This NEEDS to be addressed. Based on reviews everyone is having the same issue. This app's deficiencies make the whole camera purchase useless

author: Suzie Green
comment: Just a disaster on android. Completely unreliable as a baby monitor. Really disappointed.

author: G Guena
comment: Beautiful and right gadgets but hasn't worked properly since I bought it, signal and connection bad, no phone call support and doesnt work on android; huge shame!
The live video feed won't work since the update to Nokia from Withings. It just keeps saying that it is loading.

author: Ashley Harsh
comment: This hasn't worked properly since the day we bought it and has unfortunately only gotten worse. Biggest waste of money.

author: John Kramer
comment: Waste of money and time.  They broke it a year ago.  I ran mine over with my car

author: Fedde Oosterhout
comment: App sucks!! I will only get the message 'Your camera cannot be reached'.

author: Ed Knowles
comment: Load of rubbish on Android. Barely works. Used to be Withings home before Nokia and useless then.

author: Dustin Thornton
comment: If you need to use this on Android, return it. It does not work on Android.
